name: My Wolf
description:
In this little game, you take care of a wolf. Feel free to name it! But, don't get to attached. You must feed this wolf, bath this wolf, love this wolf.

Feel free to kill it and start over!

I needed something to do over Christmas break, so this is it.

Took me a little under a week to make, plus a few days to fix some silly bugs, but I finished!

**Don't over feed! Make sure he is always happy and healthy!

My Twitter: twitter.com/WolfAndBoy

CarbonCopy: wolfandboy.carbonmade.com/projects/5441573

Patreon: patreon.com/wolfandboy
